verses.roman:
taṁ vande kṛṣṇa-caitanyaṁ
rāmacandra-purī-bhayāt
laukikāhārataḥ svaṁ yo
bhikṣānnaṁ samakocayat

synonyms: tam—to Him; vande—I offer my respectful obeisances; kṛṣṇa-caitanyam—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rāmacandra-purī-bhayāt—due to fear of Rāmacandra Purī; laukika—ordinary; āhārataḥ—from eating; svam—His own; yaḥ—who; bhikṣā-annam—quantity of food; samakocayat—reduced.
translation: Let me offer my respectful obeisances to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who reduced His eating due to fear of the criticism of Rāmacandra Purī.
